author: agilliland
msg: moving planet feed servlet to new rendering system.  this is the last of the old velocity servlets.
- updated planet feed servlet to use new rendering system
- removed RollerRequest from planet feed servlet and use parse PlanetRequest now
- created new PlanetCache shared cache class for planet content
- removed if planet modified filter, that logic is handled in planet feed servlet now
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: bravi
msg: Fixed the pom to properly build the dependent modules. Related to: (YOKO-86) RMI module fails to build because of its dependency on the yoko-spec-corba module.
